category.title: French Toast
category.description: Sliced Texas bread dipped in our homemade egg batter, grilled to perfection. Served with maple syrup and butter. Substitute for gluten-free bread ($2.00).

meals.title: Bonjour
meals.description: Our signature french toast. Short(2) $5.99 Full(3) $8.99

meals.title: Scali French Toast
meals.description: Our signature french toast with Scali bread. Short(2) $4.99 Full(3) $6.99

meals.title: Le Petit Grille
meals.description: Topped with roasted coconut, fresh diced pineapple and yogurt.

meals.title: Paris
meals.description: Topped with melted mascarpone cheese, blueberries, strawberries and caramel sauce.

meals.title: La Tour Eiffel
meals.description: Topped with Nutella, bananas, strawberries and yogurt.

category.title: Breakfast Sandwiches
category.description: All breakfast sandwiches are served with homefries.

meals.title: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
meals.description: Choose any one meat to finish your sandwich. Choose bacon, sausage, turkey, or ham. Substitute smoked salmon for $2.50 more.

meals.title: Signature Sandwich
meals.description: Apple wood smoked bacon, egg homemade corned beef hash, melted cheddar cheese and crispy home fries all piled high on a brioche bun.

meals.title: The Breakfast Burrito
meals.description: Sausage, scrambled eggs, black beans, salsa, guacamole and melted cheddar cheese in a wrap.

meals.title: The Lox
meals.description: Bagel, egg, fresh tomato, sliced red onion, smoked salmon, cream cheese spread, and capers.

meals.title: The Monte Cristo
meals.description: French toasted style, virginia ham, two eggs any style and melted swiss cheese.

meals.title: Belgian Waffle
meals.description: Served with maple syrup and butter. Add fruit to your waffle $1.50 each. (Banana, strawberry, blueberry, roasted coconut, pecans, chocolate chips, pineapple and nutella).

meals.title: Chicken & Waffle
meals.description: Crispy fried chicken wings served on a belgian waffle.

meals.title: Huevos Rancheros
meals.description: Two eggs any style topped w/onions, peppers, melted  cheddar cheese. With black beans, sausa, sour cream, guacamole and tortillas on the side.

meals.title: The Carnegie
meals.description: Three scrambled eggs with pastrami topped with pepperjack cheese, home fries, and toast.

meals.title: ‘Loaded’ Home Fries
meals.description: Home fries tossed with mushrooms, sausage, diced tomatoes, peppers, onions and spinach with melted cheddar cheese topped with two eggs any style and a lemon zest hollandaise sauce.

meals.title: Flat Iron Steak
meals.description: 6oz flat iron steak, 3 eggs any style, home fries or tossed salad served with choice of toast.

meals.title: The Lox Platter
meals.description: Smoked salmon, bagel with cream cheese, sliced tomatoes, red sliced onions, capers, and organic greens.

meals.title: The Grand Slam!
meals.description: Our best special offer! 3 eggs any style, 2 bacon strips, 2 sausage with a choice of 2 slices of french toast or 2 pancakes, home fries or tossed salad and a cup of coffee only. No Substitution.

meals.title: Hungry Man
meals.description: Two farm fresh eggs any style, served with house toast and home fries or tossed salad.

meals.title: Truck Guy
meals.description: Two eggs any style choose bacon, signature sausage or ham, served with house toast and home fries or tossed salad.
